| HistoryText             = [[Arnim Zola (Earth-616)|Arnim Zola]] hired the Rat Pack to scour the ruins of New York to find people he could use in his experiments.

Norman Osborn (under the alias of Mr. Green) also hired the Rat Pack to attack the facilities of New York every full moon. Osborn became public advocate, knowing he would be next in line to become mayor, by denouncing the Rat Pack raids. The Rat Pack kidnapped the mayor and brought him to [[Hoboken]], [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]]. [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]] pursued the mayor and helped him escape from the Goblin's captivity.{{r|Spider-Man: Goblin Moon}}
